New Delhi, April 16 (IANS) Taiwanese tech giant Asus on Tuesday said that its newly launched dual-screen laptop ‘Zenbook DUO’ is now available in India.

articles.title: Aditya Birla banks on ₹100-crore app to scale financial services arm | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Aditya Birla Capital, the financial services arm of Aditya Birla Group, launched its fintech app ABCD on Tuesday aimed at adding 30 million users in the next 3 years.
articles.content: MUMBAI : The Aditya Birla Group is banking on a new app built at a cost of 100 crore to nearly double its customer base in three years and keep pace with the expected growth in Indias financial servi… [+4077 chars]
